value_type.description: A representation of the type of the value (for example, 'string' or 'integer').

owner_id.description: The unique identifier of the resource that owns the metafield.

created_at.description: The date and time the metafield was created in ISO 8601 format.

description.description: The description of the metafield, providing additional information.

type.description: The type of the metafield value, such as 'string', 'integer', 'json_string', etc.

updated_at.description: The date and time the metafield was last updated in ISO 8601 format.

shop_url.description: The shop URL where the metafield is associated with.

admin_graphql_api_id.description: A unique identifier for the metafield used in the Shopify Admin GraphQL API.

namespace.description: The namespace for the metafield, helping to group related metafields together.

id.description: A unique identifier for the metafield.

value.description: The actual value of the metafield based on its type.

owner_resource.description: The type of resource that owns the metafield, such as 'product' or 'collection'.

key.description: The key or name that identifies the metafield.
